wmndsWarningTextProps.name: contentText
wmndsWarningTextProps.description: Required. Specifies the content that will be part of the warning text component. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

wmndsWarningTextProps.name: contentHTML
wmndsWarningTextProps.description: Required. Uses HTML to specifies what content will be part of warning text component.

wmndsWarningTextProps.name: classes
wmndsWarningTextProps.description: Specifies what class modifiers to apply to warning text component.

wmndsWarningTextProps.name: icon
wmndsWarningTextProps.description: Name of the icon, which will be used to import icon and place it on the left side of the warning text, before text. By default it uses the general-warning-triangle icon. Icon names can be found on the icons page.
